message: We can use tools such as, www.opensiteexplorer.org, www.majesticseo.com, siteexplorer.search.yahoo.com, blekko's /seo tool, or even search operators to discover/report on backlinks to a site. What other tools and methods are useful and what are some +/- of each.
You really nailed the main tools there.
One other worthy mention is setting up Google Alerts to monitor brand name mentions without a link.
